headline.main: At Least 16 Killed in Panama After Bus Drives Into Ravine
headline.print_headline: At Least 16 Killed in Panama After Bus Drives Into Ravine

lead_paragraph: At least 16 farmworkers were killed and 35 injured when a bus drove off a highway down a ravine and plunged into a river on Sunday, local authorities said.
snippet: At least 16 farmworkers were killed and 35 injured when a bus drove off a highway down a ravine and plunged into a river on Sunday, local authorities said....
